author: Simple History
description:
Play War Thunder for free and get a huge bonus pack when you sign up using our links on PC & consoles - https://wtplay.link/simplehistory or iOS/Android - https://wtm.game/simplehistory

They boiled their own bullets before trading them to locals — and it was meant to sabotage the enemy. From Soviet ammunition in Afghanistan to rigged rounds in Vietnam and explosive coal in the Civil War, this is the strange history of weapons hidden in plain sight.
